title: 10-5-25 I have two questions

title: Moving Thunderbird to a new computer
content: I've been reading how to move my emails to a new computer. There are two users on the old computer, both with Thunderbird. When moving the email profile to the new computer, does it pick up both users, or does this need to be done separately for each individual Thunderbird email account? If so, I assume I need to set up both users on the new computer before starting the Thunderbird move. Also, how can I be absolutely sure I'm dealing with a recent enough email version on the old computer? My Thunderbird updates frequently but the new one seems to be slightly off.
creator: glennedward

title: Cannot login to icloud email on account set up
content: I just installed Thunderbird and wanted to use it for my old gmail and my current icloud emails, however, while the gmail one logs in fine, each time I try to log in with my icloud email with the correct password it says "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration username or password.". Am I doing something wrong?

creator: t.hatakeyama

title: multiple signature texts
content:
It makes sense that you might want your signature text to change depending on who you are communicating with (employer, business, friend, etc).

In Outlook you can enter several signature texts, identified by a name. I sure would like to have that in Thunderbird!

Another possibility would be to circulate among several signature texts, just to "keep it fresh".

Thanks for your consideration.
creator: tpgettys

title: Posta inviata visualizzata su tutti i pc
content: Buongiorno, vorrei sapere se è possibile avere thunderbird sincronizzato su tutti i dispositivi posseduti. Mi spiego meglio. Siamo una picccola società e condividiamo degli indirizzi email (proprietari) e avremmo bisogno di poter vedere la posta inviata da ciascun dispositivo (PC, tablet, Smartphone) in cui è configurata quella casella di posta. È possibile?
creator: corrado.pani
